mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review values ( rev_seq.nextval, #{acc_seq}, #{rev_sysname}, #{rev_star}, #{rev_content}, #{store_seq}, #{order_seq}, sysdate, null )
mapper.select: SELECT M.ACC_SEQ, M.MEM_NICK, R.REV_SYSNAME, R.REV_STAR, R.REV_CONTENT, O.MENU_LIST FROM MEMBER M JOIN REVIEW R ON M.ACC_SEQ = R.ACC_SEQ JOIN ORDERS O ON R.ACC_SEQ = O.ACC_SEQ;
